summary: Improved all spells so they are useful at high levels. destruction spells are destructive now by doubling their damage (including traps). Non-offensive/Defensive(such as clairvoyance) spells have their magicka cost reduced upto 50% so you will not find yourself out of magicka when battle starts.

[b]Destruction:[/b]

[b]Illusion:[/b]

Call to arms cost reduced from 650 to 500.

Harmony/hysteria/Mayhem lvl increased from 25 to 50.

[b]Restoration:[/b]

All Healing spells cure 2x more including dawnguard(heal undead,etc.).
Wards cost is reduced.

Sun fire now deals 50 damage instead of 25.

Turn lesser undead can turn lvl 12 instead of 6.

Poison rune/stendarr's aura cost reduced from 250 to 185.

Repel lesser undead can turn upto lvl 15 instead of 8.
